segments.text: I see the garden outside the window, and it looks so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the chaos inside is almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes like nothing is wrong, but the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and it’s like a little adventure for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how absorbed they all are in their own tasks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, but no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like a little acrobat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get caught before they get their treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so patient, just waiting for her brother to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is so full of life and little moments.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the drawing captures all these details.
segments.speaker: PAR
